text.p: NOTE: Q3 1997 net income includes $0.04 a share restructuring charge and a charge of $0.19 for discontinued operations. Excluding charges, Q3 1997 income $0.30 a share before rounding and $0.31 after rounding.

Q3 1997 income from continuing operations $0.27 a share after $0.04 restructuring charges vs $0.27.
